PlayVS | Various Roles | Santa Monica, CA (relo avail) | Onsite | https://jobs.github.com/companies/playvs

-Build an esports platform that makes esports an official varsity sport and validates the hobbies of millions of high school students

-Still early enough where you'll have a significant impact without having to do all of the initial groundwork (we have a functioning product)

-Stack: ReactJS, NodeJS, Redis. Looking for fullstack, backend and frontend engineers

To talk shop before applying email will@playvs.com or to apply email careers@playvs.com.
